listitem.para: [upstream] - Complete fix for Thunderbird with GCC-6.1.
[upstream] - Use internal copy of SQLite for Thunderbird and remove -DSQLITE_ENABLE_FTS3_TOKENIZER=1 from SQLite instructions to avoid potential security vulnerability.
[upstream] - Added build-fix for thunderbird-45.1.1 with gcc-6.1.
[upstream] - Add autoconf-2.13, now required by firefox-47.0.
[upstream] - Clarify some of the details in nfs-utils.
[upstream] - patch pcre-8.38 for various upstream fixes including for CVE-2016-1283.
[upstream] - Update to Xorg Intel driver git version as of commit 0340718.
[upstream] - Update to gstreamer-1.6.1 and associated plugin packages.
[upstream] - Update to gstreamer and gst-* to version 1.6.0.
[upstream] - Fix Inkscape, GParted and Gtkmm2 to build with the new GNU C++ libraries below.
[upstream] - Add option to disable gconf in firefox.
